text: Pretty sure the sandbox account allows for email template building. Make sure you have the correct sandbox acct
<@UD53A9UUR> aight, I'll check with support and see if I can get that rollin
<@UEC65BQV8> <@U6W3H6YN8> this looks like something on our end.

Hey <@UEC65BQV8>, we have some work to do to make sure the sandbox portal workflow does not have major pitfalls like these.

What level of access would you expect to have in an ideal world in these portals? Just Design Manager access? Or, access to the editor for custom email templates without the ability to actually send them ?
Access to the editor to test what my marketers would be using. Testing hubl blocks, that sort of thing. Block the send would be perfect.

Basically I want to develop email layouts just like I would page layouts, get it all nice and purdy, then push to master and deploy on prod, ready and available for people to start plugging in content then send emails from our paid account
Makes total sense! Will look into making this happen
